summary: After copper miners discover part of the frozen tail of a prehistoric monster in Lapland, scientists inadvertently bring it back to life.
cast: Bent Mejding|Asbjørn Andersen|Povl Wøldike|Ann Smyrner|Mimi Heinrich|Dirch Passer|Marlies Behrens|Carl Ottosen|Ole Wisborg|Birthe Wilke|Mogens Brandt|Kjeld Petersen|Jens Due|May Reimers|Jørgen Blaksted|Robert Cornthwaite|Børge Møller Grimstrup|Egon Gydesen|Knud Hallest|Svend Johansen|Benny Juhlin|Dirk Melchior|Bodil Miller|Hardy Rafn|Martin Stander|Alex Suhr|Poul Thomsen|Claus Toksvig|Bent Vejlby|Alfred Wilken
keywords: monster|kaiju|monster terrorizes city|giant monster|city in panic
director: Directors: Poul Bang, Sidney W. Pink (as Sidney Pink)
title: Reptilicus
